answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Try using a container that has a small hole on the top that doesn't allow large garbage to be put in the the container.  Also, placing your recycling container right next to your garbage container should help too.  If those things don't work, having some kind of clear container helps people see what should be put into the container.  This has reduced contamination at many of our special events.  I would think it would work at a park too! I'm just not sure what kind of permanent containers they make that are clear!

answers.author: Jennifer Chadwell
answers.text:
We applied for and received a grant for our largest sports/athletic complex for bottle recycling containers.  These containers are actually shaped like a giant plastic bottle and the hole is only large enough to fit a standard size plastic bottle.  We have had great success with these recycle bins.
